summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2004 CHRYSLER PACIFICA. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC TO REPLACE THE STARTER. THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT THE MOTOR CRADLE WAS CORRODED AND THE STARTER WAS UNABLE TO BE REPLACED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 200,000.    UPDATED 8/19/15*CN
